## Description {#details}

Sorting predicate to sort record pointers by their unique <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.

If you just need a deterministic order, use this, since it just compares two <code>unsigned</code>; the other sorting predicates require string manipulation.

Definition at line 2045 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h">Record.h</a>.
